page.title: 18HOME LIFE IN PARKGATE
page.content: I get up at{7.30a.m.}and have breakfast. I dress after that. At about{8.20}I pick up my friend Alec and we walk to School, 5 minutes away. When I go home at about{6.00p.m.}I may watch T.V. until we have{dinner {at 6.30.}After I play cricket with my Dad or, if it's my sister's choice, we go cycling. I go to bed at{9.00. { }On Mondays and Fridays I go to School for cricket nets and on most Wednesdays and Saturdays my Mum comes to watch me play cricket for the School. On{Sundays}the family goes to{ {Church}from 11.00 to 12.00. After Church we have lunch and then go for a walk. During my{holidays}I often play{ {tennis}at the playing fields of{ {Unilever}where my Dad works as a Scientist.
